InventoryCountAssessment.name: InventoryCountAssessment
InventoryCountAssessment.description: Represents an inventory count performed at a location.

InventoryCountPlanId.description: Inventory count plan associated with the inventory count.

IsBlindCount.description: Indicates whether the expected inventory quantity is hidden from the assignee when they count the inventory (true) or not (false).

LastReferencedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last accessed this record indirectly, for example, through a list view or related record.

LastViewedDate.description: The timestamp when the current user last viewed this record or list view. If this value is null, and LastReferenceDate is not null, the user accessed this record or list view indirectly.

LocationId.description: Location associated with the inventory count.

Name.description: Name of the inventory count assessment.

OwnerId.description: ID of the owner of this object.

PlannedEndDateTime.description: Planned end date and time for the inventory count.

PlannedStartDateTime.description: Planned start date and time for the inventory count.
